  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:T210_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>T210_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Potable water treatment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trinkwasserbehandlung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Traitement à l'eau potable</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tratamento de água potable</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trattamento delle acque potabile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατεργασία πόσιμου νερού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tratamiento de aguas potable</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">Without it we are dead! Water is essential, but what processes must it go through to become fit for human consumption? This unit will guide you through the continuous cycling of water between land, open water surfaces and the sea before moving on to an overview of the water treatment and supply process.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Environment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Water_treatment</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ohne sie sind wir tot! Wasser ist 
wesentlich, aber welche Prozesse muß es durchmachen, um für 
menschlichen Verbrauch passend zu werden? Diese Maßeinheit 
führt Sie durch das ununterbrochene Radfahren des Wassers zwischen 
Land, geöffnete Wasseroberflächen und das Meer, bevor sie an auf 
einen Überblick über den Wasserbehandlung- und Zubehörprozeß 
bewegt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sans lui nous sommes morts ! L'eau est 
essentielle, mais quels processus doit-elle intervenir pour devenir 
convenable pour la consommation humaine ? Cette unité vous 
guidera pendant le cycle continu de l'eau entre la terre, les surfaces
ouvertes de l'eau et la mer avant de passer à une vue d'ensemble du 
processus de traitement et d'offre à l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sem ele nós estamos inoperantes! A água 
é essencial, mas que processos deve ir completamente tornar-se apta 
para o consumo humano? Esta unidade guiá-lo-á com dar um ciclo
contínuo da água entre a terra, superfícies abertas da água e o 
mar antes de mover-se sobre para uma vista geral do processo do 
tratamento e da fonte de água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Senza esso siamo guasti! L'acqua è 
essenziale, ma che processi deve andare attraverso per diventare 
adatta per consumo umano? Questa unità li guiderà durante 
ciclare continuo dell'acqua fra la terra, le superfici aperte 
dell'acqua ed il mare prima del passare verso una descrizione del 
processo di trattamento delle acque e del rifornimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χωρίς το είμαστε νεκροΐ Το ύδωρ είναι 
ουσιαστικό, αλλά ποιες διαδικασίες πρέπει να πάει κατευθείαν για
να γίνει κατάλληλο για την ανθρώπινη κατανάλωση; Αυτή η 
μονάδα θα σας καθοδηγήσει μέσω της συνεχούς ανακύκλωσης του 
ύδατος μεταξύ του εδάφους, των ανοικτών επιφανειών ύδατος και 
της θάλασσας πρίν κινείται προς μια επισκόπηση της διαδικασίας 
κατεργασίας ύδατος και ανεφοδιασμού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Sin él somos muertos! ¿El agua es 
esencial, pero qué procesos debe ir a través para llegar a ser apta 
para la consumición humana? Esta unidad le dirigirá durante 
completar un ciclo continuo del agua entre la pista, las superficies 
abiertas del agua y el mar antes de mover encendido a una descripción
del proceso del tratamiento de aguas y de la fuente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umgebung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Water_treatment</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
